column5: Would like information on North Spirit lake Lodge, a fly-in camp north of Red Lake...thanks!

My wife and have been there several times. We quit going when I stopped flying our own plane and my kids were ready for college. This is a TOP NOTCH resort. The fishing is fantastic. Bill and Val are as good as it gets. You can't go wrong if flying in is your thing. Let me know if you want more info.
Drew- It sounds like you have had some good experiences at NSSL. Can you tell me a little more about the lake,cabins, etc? Thanks.. Bass Lake

I'm surprised more guys haven't been here just judging by price, size of lake, accommodations, etc. But, for some reason I never ran across it in my online searches. Looks like it isn't C&R so maybe too much fishing pressure?
